forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
Morning light bathes Downtown San Francisco in a muted glow, hinting at the day’s potential while the clouds linger like old guests at a party. With a gentle breeze teasing the air, the current temperature hugs around the comfortable mid-fifties, a pleasant precursor to the promise of a sunnier afternoon. Observing the skyline, one might notice a shroud of fog that timidly tips its hat to the Golden Gate, before retreating, allowing the sun to breathe life into the scene. Today, as the weather warms, clouds will give way to clearer skies, flirting briefly with the sunshine before yielding to a more brilliant display.

Ideal attire consists of layers, perfectly suited for this temperate dance; a light jacket should serve well in the morning chill, easily cast aside as the sun strides high in the sky. As you move through the bustling streets or wander along the waterfront, the tantalizing weather invites contemplation and quiet moments. Perhaps you might consider a leisurely stroll to one of the many cafes serving fresh brews, or take a moment at a park to soak up the warmth while the hustle of the city carries on around you. Whether you choose to sit with a book or engage in quiet observation of the city’s rhythm, this day holds the promise of a blissful exploration of the heart of San Francisco.
